title: Changes in screening, diagnosis, management, and outcomes of gestational diabetes during the COVID-19 pandemic: A systematic review
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Kowsar Qaderi, Ahmadreza Shamsabadi, Arezoo Haseli, Sajjad Ghane Ezabadi, Leila Asadi, Younes Jesmani, Mehri Kalhor, Bita Jamali, Mehrnaz Kajbafvala, Rasa khodavirdilou, Aida Mohammadi, Dara Rasoal
